Data Scientist.title: Foundations: Digital Literacy & Logic
Data Scientist.desc: Master the basics of computing, internet navigation, and introductory logic needed for data roles.

Data Scientist.title: Core Skills: Python & SQL
Data Scientist.desc: Learn the industry-standard languages for data manipulation and database management.

Data Scientist.title: Certification: Google Data Analytics
Data Scientist.desc: Complete a professional certificate to validate your skills. Includes capstone project.

Data Scientist.title: Job Readiness & Placement
Data Scientist.desc: Prepare your CV, join communities, and apply for internships.

Software Engineer.title: Foundations: CS Basics
Software Engineer.desc: Understand algorithms, data structures, and how the internet works.

Software Engineer.title: Core Skills: Full Stack Dev
Software Engineer.desc: Master HTML/CSS, JavaScript, and a backend framework like Node.js.

Software Engineer.title: Certification: Cloud & DevOps
Software Engineer.desc: Learn to deploy applications on AWS/Azure and manage CI/CD pipelines.

Software Engineer.title: Job Readiness & Portfolio
Software Engineer.desc: Build a GitHub portfolio and contribute to open source projects.

Solar PV Installer.title: Foundations: Electrical Safety
Solar PV Installer.desc: Understand basic electrical circuits, safety standards (OSHA), and tool handling.

Solar PV Installer.title: Core Skills: PV Systems & Wiring
Solar PV Installer.desc: Learn to install solar panels, inverters, and battery storage systems.

Solar PV Installer.title: Certification: EPRA T1/T2 License
Solar PV Installer.desc: Prepare for and pass the national regulatory licensing exam for solar technicians.

Solar PV Installer.title: Field Experience
Solar PV Installer.desc: Log required hours under a licensed contractor to gain full accreditation.

Precision Ag Specialist.title: Foundations: Agronomy Basics
Precision Ag Specialist.desc: Understand crop cycles, soil health, and basic farm management.

Precision Ag Specialist.title: Core Skills: GIS & Drone Ops
Precision Ag Specialist.desc: Learn to use GPS tools, fly drones for mapping, and interpret aerial data.

Precision Ag Specialist.title: Certification: Remote Sensing
Precision Ag Specialist.desc: Gain proficiency in analyzing satellite imagery for crop health monitoring.

Precision Ag Specialist.title: Service Provision
Precision Ag Specialist.desc: Set up a service model to offer precision insights to local farmers.

interviewQuestions.agri: Describe a time you used data to improve a crop yield or farm process.

interviewQuestions.digital: Tell me about a challenging bug you fixed and your process.
